name: Lunch (North)
cuisines: North Indian, Middle Indian, Fast Food

menu.name: Dal Makhani
menu.desc: This Dal Makhani recipe is a restaurant style version with subtle smoky flavors and creaminess of the lentils. If you love authentic Punjabi food then you are going to love this Dal Makhani even more.

menu.name: Paneer butter Masala
menu.desc: Paneer Butter Masala is one of Indiaâ€™s most popular paneer gravy recipe. This recipe with Indian cottage cheese cubes in a creamy tomato sauce is one that I have been making for a long time. With my video and step-by-step guide you can easily make this restaurant style paneer butter masala at home

menu.name: Palak Paneer
menu.desc: Palak Paneer is one of the most popular Indian dish made with succulent paneer cubes (Indian cottage cheese) in a smooth spinach sauce. This vibrant green palak paneer is made with fresh spinach leaves (palak in Hindi), onions, tomatoes, herbs and spices. Make this super delicious palak paneer with my easy step by step photo guide and video.

menu.name: Supreme Veg Biryani
menu.desc: The authentic Veg delicacy seasoned with herbs and spices and then layered into fine grain Basmati Rice and cooked to perfection.

menu.name: Dal Tadka
menu.desc: Dal Tadka is a popular Indian lentil dish made with arhar dal (husked & split pigeon pea lentils) or masoor dal (husked & split red lentils). This Dal Tadka recipe gives you a delicious creamy dal with smoked flavors

menu.name: Kadai Paneer
menu.desc: Kadai Paneer is a vibrant, tangy, spiced paneer dish that can brighten up your day any time. Made with the usual Indian pantry staples like onions, tomatoes, capsicum (green bell peppers) and Indian spices, this bright dish comes together in 30 minutes
